divs: Sighting DetailsI HAD JUST STEPPED INTO MY YARD. LOOKED UP TO THE SKY AND SAW THIS GLOWING ORB APPROACHING FROM THE WEST. IT MADE A QUICK LEFT TURN AND HEADED NORTH EAST AT TREMENDOUS SPEED. IT MADE NO SOUND. IT HAPPENED SO QUICKLY. WHEN I TRIED TO VISUALLY FOLLOW IT, I COULD NOT FOR MY TREE BLOCKED MY VIEW.
